tool_description: The Weather Forecast API provides current and future weather forecast information for a given location. It returns temperature in both Celsius and Fahrenheit units along with other information like condition,date etc. It is easy to use and can be integrated into a variety of applications and systems.
name: Weather Forecast API
title: Weather Forecast API

api_list.name: City Name
api_list.description: Retrieves the current weather and forecast data for a given location.
